title: Deutsche Bank to secure crypto for institutions, TRX and DOMI may find support
description: Deutsche Bank to offer secure crypto storage for institutional investors, potentially affecting Tron (TRX) and Domini.art (DOMI)

title: Ripple vs. SEC Litigation Takes Unexpected Turn: Can the XRP Price Seize This Opportunity and Rise to $7?
description: The SEC’s case against Ripple plays a pivotal role in XRP’s valuation. Expert predictions hint at possible bullish trajectory with price targets of up to $7.
